message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to your business. While I can't disclose the exact details right now, I assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000, a price I believe is fair given its potential.  If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details further. This is a limited-time offer, as another party is also interested.
